## Package: uplift
Package uplift by Guelman (https://github.com/cran/uplift).  This package splits into quantiles, but can have issues finding splits when distributions have peaks:

```{r}
library(grf)
library(ggplot2)
library(tweedie)
library(uplifteval)

#
# Case: plot_uplift_guelman fails to find quantiles
#
# Generate equal prediction distributions
n <- 1000
W <- rbinom(n, 1, 0.5)
Y <- rbinom(n, 1, 0.5)
p1 <- rtweedie(n, xi=1.4, mu=1, phi=1)
hist(p1,100)

plot_uplift_guelman(p1, W, Y, groups=10)


```
